Overload.descr:
Params: menu Menu Handle. source_client Source client, or 0 to ignore immunity. in_game_only True to only select in-game players. alive_only True to only select alive players.
Return: Number of clients added.
Notes: Adds targets to an admin menu. Each client is displayed as: name (userid) Each item contains the userid as a string for its info.

Params: menu Menu Handle. source_client Source client, or 0 to ignore immunity. flags COMMAND_FILTER flags from commandfilters.inc.
Return: Number of clients added.
Notes: Adds targets to an admin menu. Each client is displayed as: name (userid) Each item contains the userid as a string for its info.

Return: Handle to the admin menu's TopMenu, or INVALID_HANDLE if not created yet.
Notes: Retrieves the Handle to the admin top menu.

Params: topmenu Handle to the admin menu's TopMenu.
Notes: Called when the admin menu is created and 3rd party plugins can grab the Handle or add categories.

Params: topmenu Handle to the admin menu's TopMenu.
Notes: Called when the admin menu is ready to have items added.

Params: topmenu TopMenu Handle. client Client index.
Return: True on success, false on failure.
Notes: Re-displays the admin menu to a client after selecting an item. Auto-aborts if the Handle is invalid.
